summary: REQ-16 and REQ-17 appear implemented end-to-end (new backend field, persisted/returned, migration defaulting to false, and directory API/hook filter support). REQ-19 UI filter toggle and API wiring appear implemented. One key constraint may be violated by adding backend/migration.mo (logic not solely in backend/main.mo), and the ProfileMe view-mode requirement to show “✓ Supporter of the community” cannot be confirmed from the provided truncated diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend must remain a single Motoko actor with all logic in backend/main.mo (no additional backend logic files).
missing_requirements.reason: A new backend module file was added (backend/migration.mo) and imported/used by backend/main.mo, placing backend logic outside backend/main.mo.

missing_requirements.requirement: In ProfileMe view mode, the Mentorship summary area includes “✓ Supporter of the community” when the flag is enabled.
missing_requirements.reason: ProfileMe.tsx is truncated before the view-mode Mentorship summary rendering; the diff evidence shows the edit toggle and persistence, but does not show the required view-mode “✓ Supporter of the community” text.
